introBox.headline: Create a Lambda function that sends events to EventBridge.
text: The SAM template deploys a Lambda function with permission to publish events to EventBridge. The Lambda function publishes an event to the default bus in EventBridge when invoked.

bullets.text: Integrating Amazon EventBridge into your serverless applications
Use Amazon EventBridge to Build Decoupled, Event-Driven Architectures
